nobel sammanalabhi dakunu apa‡∑ärikanu lekhikawaka wunu nadin godimar, koetsige lekhanaya wiwechanayata lakkaranne ‚Äòdakunu apa‡∑ärikawe warnabhedawadayen pasuwa godanagunu samajaya athule koetsita dakaganna labunu ekama sathyaya kalu jathika pawulak dushithayeku aaraksha karanne ohuth ee pawulema samajikayek wu nisa bawa kiyana kathawa pamanakda yanna kanagatuwata karunak bawayi.

thama 12 hawiridi diyaniya dushya kirima sandaha thamage aniyam purushayata anubala dunne yayi kiyana mawak alawwa polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena atha.alawwa polisiyata labunu paminillak anuwa karana lada parikshanayedi sakakara mawa thama diyaniya dushya kirima sandaha thamage aniyam purushayata anubala di athayi anawaranaya wiya.me anuwa maya warakapola mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha idiripath karana laduwa marthu 28 thek rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kerini.
